Test_spin.comment: Magnetic moment test with nspin=2, generates SPIN_ON/SPIN_OFF marker (kval in Å⁻¹, reciprocal space)

Coarse_relax.comment: Coarse relax with larger kspacing (0.05→0.04), generates STRU_ION_D

Relax.comment: Fine relax with increasing K-density (0.04→0.03→0.02), generates final STRU_ION_D

Scf.comment: Self-consistent calculation using Relax final structure (kspacing=0.02 for high accuracy)

Band.comment: STRU_ION_D from Relax, CHG files from Scf

Dos.comment: STRU_ION_D from Relax, CHG files from Scf
